scene.name: hows-it-going
scene.option: Huh. Not sure that lady was right about the on-ramp to the |Zero| being here.
Hey, you got something on your hat.

scene.name: onramp
scene.option: I guess you just can't tell with some folks. They're liable to run you around just for kicks.
Better look around, though. Must be down here somewhere.

scene.name: runaround
scene.option: Well, try not to get frustrated.
Should we look around? Or get back on the road? Oh, I don't know.

scene.name: somewhere
scene.option: Better hurry, though. Weather's about to turn.
Let's take our time and check this out thorough, OK?

scene.name: hat
scene.option: Been digging in Lysette's flowers again?
Did you pick that up on the road?

scene.name: flowers
scene.option: She just can't keep you out of there, can she?
The way Ira used to yell at you, you'd think he was losing his mind.

scene.name: road
scene.option: Don't you ever get tired of nosing around strange places?
You like it out here don't you. Picking up strange dirt on the road.
